tool_description: Real-time scores, schedules, and betting odds for US leagues.  Unbeatable value.  Documentation: https://sportspagefeeds.com/documentation
title: Sportspage Feeds

api_list.name: Teams
api_list.description: Returns a list of teams within a specified league, conference, or division.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

parameters.name: conference
parameters.description: A conference within the specified league

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: A division within the specified conference

api_list.name: Game By ID
api_list.description: Returns a specific game based on its ID.

api_list.name: Games
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportspage-feeds.p.rapidapi.com/games"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportspage-feeds.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: odds
parameters.description: A comma-separated filter to select games with one or more of the following odds types: \\\\\\\"spread\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"moneyline\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"total\\\\\\\", or \\\\\\\"any\\\\\\\"

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: A team participating in one or more games

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: A division within the specified conference

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: One or two (comma-separated) YYYY-MM-DD- or ISO-formatted dates

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of game results to skip, which is required to access results beyond the first 100

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: A valid status of one of the following: \\\\\\\"scheduled\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"in progress\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"final\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"canceled\\\\\\\", or \\\\\\\"delayed\\\\\\\"

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

parameters.name: conference
parameters.description: A conference within the specified league

api_list.name: Conferences
api_list.description: Returns a list of conferences and divisions within the specified league. Use this endpoint to obtain conference and division names to be used as parameters for other requests.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description: Returns the odds history for a game by type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: An odds type of one of the following: \\\"spread\\\", \\\"moneyline\\\", \\\"total\\\", or \\\"any\\\"
